On 12/7/05, viveksaxena=
1975 <viveks@...> wrote:
> I havnt yet started using Junit, I am jus=
t considering.
> I need to develop test suite based on Unix and I dont want=
 to use IDE.
> is that OK ?

Yes.

Further than that, I recommend it. Where=
 I work, we always perform
builds (and the running of their JUnit tests) fo=
r deployment to our
application servers on dedicated build machines. We nev=
er perform
deployment builds on a developer's workstation; far too many unk=
nowns
and differences between developers and what they do to their machines=
.

Simon
